name: jsPacman
description: A JavaScript DOM-based remake of the classic Ms. Pac-Man game.

scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack
scripts.demo:publish: npm run test && cross-env JSPACMAN_HEAD_TAGS='<meta name="google-site-verification" content="UCroCcyY7Zf5eVbo3EV1Ao9eJcfVK3psojHB1JFo23s"><script data-goatcounter="https://jspacman.goatcounter.com/count" async src="//gc.zgo.at/count.js"></script>' npm run build && cd dist && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update demo' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -m 'Update demo' && git push git@github.com:8tentaculos/jsPacman.git gh-pages --force

author: Alberto Masuelli <alberto.masuelli@gmail.com> (https://github.com/8tentaculos)
